author: Adil M. Bagirov and Alex Rubinov and A. N. Soukhojak and John Yearwood
title: Unsupervised and supervised data classification via nonsmooth and global optimization
venue: School of Information Technology and Mathematical Sciences, The University of Ballarat
window: local optimization (Discrete gradient method, see Section 4). For testing the efficiency of the combination of k-means and Discrete Gradient method, we use four well-known medium-size test datasets: Australian credit dataset, Diabetes dataset, Liver disorder dataset and Vehicle dataset.
